name: traccar
description: Traccar is a self-hosted GPS tracking platform that collects location data from various devices and mobile apps. It features real-time map views, alerts, and reports via a rich web UI and mobile-friendly tools, plus a hosted cloud option.

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Track hundreds of different GPS device models and mobile apps simultaneously

features.title: Reports
features.description: Generate detailed reports on trips, stops, mileage, and device activity for any time period

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Set up notifications for speeding, geofence violations, device offline, and other events

features.title: Mobile Apps
features.description: Track devices using official Android and iOS apps that report location to your server

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Support multiple users with individual permissions and device access controls
